pain_point: Poor lead conversion rates and overwhelmed sales team
lead_message: We're losing 60% of inbound leads due to slow manual qualification. Our sales team spends 3 hours daily on leads that never convert. We need an automated scoring and routing system that can process leads in real-time and draft personalized follow-ups. Budget is approved for Q1.

pain_point: No unified lead management across channels
lead_message: We run campaigns across LinkedIn, Google Ads, trade shows, and partner referrals but have zero visibility into which channels produce qualified leads. Last quarter we missed 40+ hot leads because follow-ups fell through the cracks. Need a system that scores and prioritizes automatically.

Manual onboarding takes 2-3 weeks per client. We're evaluating workflow automation tools that can help us triage incoming inquiries and send the right follow-up at the right time. Not urgent but want to decide this quarter.

pain_point: Lead tracking falls apart after trade shows
lead_message: We collect hundreds of business cards at conferences but the follow-up process is completely manual. By the time we reach out, most leads have gone cold. Looking for something that can automate the initial outreach within 24 hours.

Our outreach emails get about 8% open rates. We saw your product mentioned in a blog post and are curious whether AI-generated emails actually perform better. Just exploring options for now, no timeline.

pain_point: Not sure if we need a CRM yet
lead_message: I run a small cafe chain (3 locations) and started collecting customer emails for promotions. Someone suggested I need a CRM but honestly I'm not sure what that even involves. Just want to understand what's out there.
